{% set employee = frappe.get_doc("Employee",doc.applicant) %} {% set installment_details = frappe.get_all("Loan Repayment Schedule", filters={"docstatus":1,"loan":doc.name}, fields=['*']) %} {% if doc.loan_application %} {% set loan_application = frappe.get_doc("Loan Application",doc.loan_application) %} {% endif %}
LOAN AGREEMENT

Between
{{ employee.salutation or "Mr/Ms" }}. {{ doc.applicant_name }} (The Borrower)
and
{{ doc.company }} (The Lender)

THIS AGREEMENT is made on {{frappe.format_date(doc.posting_date,"dd MMM, yyyy") or ""}} in Ahmedabad


The Borrower is an employee of the Lender since {{frappe.format_date(employee.date_of_joining,"dd MMM, yyyy") or ""}} and is presently serving as {% if employee.designation %} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Designation",employee.designation,"designation_name") or "" }} {% endif %} in {% if employee.department %} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Department",employee.department,"department_name") or "" }} {% endif %} Department bearing employee code {{employee.name or ""}} at {% if employee.custom_work_location %} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Address",employee.custom_work_location,"address_title") or "" }} {% endif %}.


Borrower has requested to grant Loan to him/her with purpose of {{ doc.custom_reason_for_applying or 'None' }} - {{ doc.custom_reason or 'None' }} which he/she shall repay as per the terms of this Agreement. Lender hereby agrees to grant Loan of ₹ {{ "%.2f"| format(doc.total_payment)}}/- (Rupees {{ frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.total_payment).split(" ", 1)[1] }}). Borrower, in consideration of his/her professional association with the Company in accordance with the terms and condition of this Agreement.


Borrower agrees to repay the Loan installment of ₹ {{ ("%.2f"| format(installment_details[0].monthly_repayment_amount)) if installment_details and installment_details[0] else '' }}/- per month starting from {{ frappe.format_date(installment_details[0].repayment_start_date, "MMMM, yyyy") if installment_details and installment_details[0] else '' }} month for {{ installment_details[0].repayment_periods if installment_details and installment_details[0] else '' }} consecutive months till {% if installment_details and installment_details[0] %} {% set end_month = frappe.utils.add_months(installment_details[0].repayment_start_date, installment_details[0].repayment_periods-1) %} {% if end_month.year != installment_details[0].repayment_start_date.year %} {{ frappe.format_date(end_month, "MMMM, yyyy") or ""}} {% else %} {{ frappe.format_date(end_month, "MMMM, yyyy") or "" }} {% endif %} {% endif %} with the deduction from his/her salary.


If employee leaves the organization in between then the loan amount will be fully recovered from his/her full and final settlement.


IN WITNESS WHEREOF the Parties hereto have executed this Agreement on the day and year first above written.

____________
Signed by {{employee.salutation or "Mr/Ms"}}. {{doc.applicant_name or ""}} 		Borrower
For and on behalf of
{{doc.company or ""}}
